EmailTemplate.subject: Your EMS CAM Connection Newsletter - October 2011
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
October 2011 Edition
Welcome to the October issue of your Client Account Manager (CAM) Connection from the EMS Solution's division of TriTech Sofware Systems.
Important Alerts & Updates (http://offers.tritech.com/EMS_CC_Oct11_AlertUpdates.html)
> TriTech Acquires VisionAir
> TriCON 2011 – What did you miss?
> TriTech Vision for 2012 and Beyond (CEO Chris Maloney’s Customer Address at TriCON - VIDEO)
> Extended Support Hours
> Customer Satisfaction Assurance - Survey Results
Products & Services (http://offers.tritech.com/EMS_CC_Oct11_ProductsServices.html)
> Sweet Billing Flex Report Generator Learn about the Sweet Billing Flex Report Generator in this recorded webinar that took place on Thursday, September 29th. Larry Cole and Michele Duwe, from TriTech's EMS Solutions Sales Team, will walk you through a step-by-step demo of how to become a Power-Flex-Report-Generator-user!
> TriTech Online Offerings - EMS.1com Interview Hear more about the future of online applications from TriTech EMS Solution's Product Manager, Charlie Barry.
> New Stuff at EMS – TriCON Presentation by Terri Jirak-Barry, VP of Operations for EMS Solutions
> October Coffee With Kelly Topics
Technical Support Hot Topics (http://offers.tritech.com/EMS_CC_Oct11_TechnicalSupportHotTopics.html)
> HIPAA 5010 Resource Center
> Quick Tips From Your EMS Support Team

> Thomas Pasquarelli, with Greater Amsterdam (NY) Volunteer Ambulance Corps, Shares Some Experiences with Fusion ePCR
